page.title: 17A FARMER'S WIFE'S WEEKDAY.
page.content: This is a day in the life of my mummy. We live on a farm by the R.Swale two miles from the village. 6.55-Alarm & weather forecast. 7.10-Get up and wake Justin 12 yrs. 7.15-Breakfast get packed lunches. 7.30-Call Justin for B'Bridge H. Sch. 7.40- " " " " " " 7.50-Justin appears-quick bkfast & go 8.00-Let geese out. 8.10-Call Elizabeth 10yrs & Alan 8. 8.15-Feed and water geese 8.30-Clear table, get ready for school 8.50-Go to village & spend 1hr. gossiping. 10.00-Coffee,hoover,tidyup,garden 11.15-Prepare lunch,mending. Crossword 12-1300-Garden 1500-Coffee. Start evening meal veg. etc. 1715-Evening meal Evening-Picking fruit. Elizabeth Wise.
